document_data.name: Cailek Balathorp
document_data.mainbody: '''Cailek Balathorp''' was a noble of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||11}} He made his living by capturing surface dwellers and delivering them to the [[drow]] who lived in the [[Underdark]] beneath the city.  He went by the nickname '''Fetterfist''' while operating as a [[slave|slaver]].{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||2}}
document_data.Description: Balathorp was tall and lanky with blond hair.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|3643|11}} In the guise of Fetterfist, he wore a leather half hood that obscured most of his face.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||7}}
